H0.text: What was the name of the Russian Submarine that sank in the Barents Sea in the year 2000 . Akula

H1.text: What was the name of the Russian Submarine that sank in the Barents Sea in the year 2000 . Delta

H2.text: What was the name of the Russian Submarine that sank in the Barents Sea in the year 2000 . Typhoon

H3.text: What was the name of the Russian Submarine that sank in the Barents Sea in the year 2000 . KURSK

A4.text: K-141 Kursk was lost when it sank in the Barents Sea on 12 August 2000.

A5.text: The submarine was officially designated as K-141 Kursk (Russian: Курск).
